divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving to work at 530 am, the sun wasn't up yet, not really any stars to be seen at the time. when i was about half way to work i looked out to my left and saw a stationary light (orangish-yellow) pretty high up and i kept driving while keeping my eye on the ball. it had no flashing lights like most worldly aircraft. i thought maybe it was a beacon light to signal planes of telephone wires or something along those lines but it was way to high up and nothing behind it. as i got closer to maybe see the shape a bit better, in a 10 second span it began to get smaller it appeared to be moving away from me in the same exact direction i was going. it shrank to about the size of a typical star then disappeared. i was a bit shocked after this happened i tried debunking it as soon as i saw it and recognized it to be nothing of earthly origin. unfortunately i wasn't able to get any photos my phone camera isn't close to good enough .
trends: There have been no other sightings in Jonestown
This sighting has never been favorited.
